extension.description: The controller for the Neo Geo AES (Advanced Entertainment System), a video game console released in the US in 1991. The Neo Geo AES was a niche system marketed toward high-end consumers. The console was expensive, as were the games themselves, which could go for hundreds of dollars.

El controlador del Neo Geo AES (Advanced Entertainment System), una consola de videojuegos lanzada en los EE. UU. En 1991. El Neo Geo AES era un sistema de nicho comercializado para consumidores de alta gama. La consola era cara, al igual que los juegos en sí, que podían costar cientos de dólares.
